## Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Timebox ticket to a 3
- [ ] Investigate cause of alert
- [ ] Fix by either
  - [ ] Handling this error in the code rather than allowing it to bubble up to sentry
  - [ ] Fixing what causes the error to be thrown
  - [ ] Filing a ticket to do the above
